name: The Gunslinger
description:
The Gunslinger is an action-roguelike where you will fight various powerful monsters. With each victory, you will be able to unlock new weapons & upgrades, making you stronger and better able to take on even more fearsome foes.

Features

  • Earn resources to unlock upgrade & create game-breaking builds!
  • Unlock weapons to blast enemies to dust & combine them with your upgrade build!
  • Endless Waves of varying enemies to survive, how far can you make it?
  • Choose from 2 game modes Normal & Hard for those of you who want to prove you are a savage gamer!
  • Unlock achievements & show off your elite gamer skills!
